scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts && cp -r src/assets ./dist && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.auth:help: pnpm run build && dist/index.js auth help
scripts.auth:login: pnpm run build && dist/index.js auth login
scripts.auth:print-access-token: pnpm run build && dist/index.js auth print-access-token
scripts.auth:logout: pnpm run build && dist/index.js auth logout
scripts.generate: pnpm run build && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 dist/index.js generate
